amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to implement an enrollment fee for the TRICARE for Life program under chapter 55 of title 10, United States Code.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 66 printed in House Report 113-170 to prohibit funds from being used to implement an enrollment fee in the TRICARE for Life program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hanabusa amendment (A058) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hanabusa amendment (A058) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A058) offered by Ms. Hanabusa.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
